attributes.action: Reduce council tax for people who recycle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE GOVERNMENT ARE ALWAYS GOING ON ABOUT RECYCLING AND THEY WANT MORE OF US TO DO IT,SO WHY NOT REDUCE THE COUNCIL TAX BY A % FOR THOSE PEOPLE WHO DO RECYLE BET THE GOVERNMENT WOULD BE IN FOR A SURPISE IF THEY DID, MANY MORE PEOPLE WOULD RECYCLE.

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
